oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Isolation of Bovine β₂-Microglobulin and its Determination by Enzyme Liked Immunosorbent Assay
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hoshi, F.
Miyazaki, O.
Nakadaka, K.
Satho, M.
Higuchi, S.
Kawamura, S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: renal dysfunction
urine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In a previous study, we clarified that low moleclar proteins increase at renal dysfunction in bovine urine. but the relationship between this protein, bovine β₂m and renal dysfunction is unclear. Thus, in this study, an attempt was make to isolate and purify bovine β₂m from urine
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 3; 250-255
